name: Breathing drawing board - Figma Challenge - 15 tips in 15 days (Day 2)
description:
This Breathing Drawing Board was made for Figma Prototype Challenge in 15 days. The purpose is to promote and teach you how to use Smart Animate in a more interesting way.

Let your creative bloom with interactive squares simply by clicking or hovering on them and sit back to see the breathing effect.


Move to Prototype page inside the file and click play to see the whole action.


If you found this helpful or interesting, please like and share. Thank you for your time!
